H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H4438.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H3079.def: = man, also known as {L:Eliakim<SDBH:אֶלְיָקִים>}; ◄ son of {L:Josiah<SDBH:יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah (609-597), appointed by Pharaoh {L:Necoh<SDBH:נְכֹה>}, who changed his name from Eliakim to Jehoiakim

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H5019.def: = man; ◄ son of Nabopolassar; ► king of {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>} from 605-562 B.C. who led the people of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} into exile

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H6696.def: = causative action by which humans attach one or more objects to another object that contains an opening ► in order to block entry and/or exit

61.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3079.def: = man, also known as {L:Eliakim<SDBH:אֶלְיָקִים>}; ◄ son of {L:Josiah<SDBH:יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah (609-597), appointed by Pharaoh {L:Necoh<SDBH:נְכֹה>}, who changed his name from Eliakim to Jehoiakim

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H214.def: = valuable goods in one's possession; ≈ falsely considered a source of well-being

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H5631.def: = a male who has been castrated and made to serve in the women's quarters in the royal palace

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H3971.def: = state in which humans or animals have a physical defect on their body

H4758.def: = the part of an object that can be seen with the eye

H7919.def: = state in which humans are able to accomplish whatever they attempt to do

H2451.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H1847.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H3581.def: = state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H1841.def: = man; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; one of the family heads who accompanied {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} back to {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} after the exile; one of the signatories to the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H5838.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zadok<SDBH:צָדֹוק>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of king {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H2451.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H998.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H825.def: exact meaning unknown; = class of persons skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found in Babylon; ► working at the royal court

H2748.def: = title of priest skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found both in Egypt and Babylon; ► working at the royal court

H4438.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H1841.def: = man; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; one of the family heads who accompanied {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} back to {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} after the exile; one of the signatories to the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3566.def: = man; ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}, who allowed the exiles from {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} to return
